tutorial.welcome: Welcome to Sights, an app designed to help you understand what's around you. To get started, tap anywhere on the screen.
tutorial.takePhoto: To take a picture, simply tap once anywhere on the screen. The app will automatically capture and analyze what's in front of you.
tutorial.adjustVolume: Use your device's volume buttons to adjust the volume.
tutorial.adjustSpeed: To change the reading speed, slide your finger up or down on the screen.
tutorial.retake: While viewing results, to stop reading, tap the screen, to retake a picture, double tap the screen. Let's get started!

camera.ready: Camera is ready. Tap anywhere on the screen to take a picture.
camera.denied: Camera permission was denied. This app requires camera access to function properly.
camera.failed: Failed to take picture. Please try again.
camera.cancelled: Picture taking was cancelled. Tap again to take a picture.
camera.grantPermission: Please grant camera permission in settings to use this app.
camera.tapToTake: Tap anywhere to take a picture

result.doubleTapRetake: Double tap to take another picture
result.errorAnalyzing: Sorry, there was an error analyzing the image. Please try again.
